scripts.watch: clear; echo "* * * *  WATCH  * * * *"; NODE_ENV=development npm run -s watch:all
scripts.dist: clear; echo "* * * *  DIST  * * * *"; NODE_ENV=production npm run -s dist:all; git add --all && git commit -m 'build & publish' && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.dist:all: npm run -s clean:dist && (npm run -s dist:css & npm run -s dist:assets & npm run -s dist:js) && npm run -s dist:finish
scripts.dist:js:browserify: browserify $npm_package_config_js_entry_file_dist --extension=.js --extension=.jsx --detectGlobals false --standalone augur-react-components -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ] -t [envify purge] | derequire
scripts.watch:dist:all: npm run -s clean:dist && (npm run -s watch:dist:css & npm run -s watch:dist:assets & npm run -s watch:dist:js)
scripts.watch:dist:js: watchify $npm_package_config_js_entry_file_dist --extension=.js --extension=.jsx --detectGlobals false --standalone augur-react-components -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ] -t [envify purge] -o 'derequire > ./dist/app.jsx && echo ---------WATCHIFY--------`date +%r`'
scripts.watch:all: npm run -s clean:demo && (npm run -s watch:css & npm run -s watch:assets & npm run -s watch:js & npm run -s watch:html)
scripts.watch:js: watchify $npm_package_config_js_entry_file_demo --extension=.js --extension=.jsx -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ] -t [envify purge] --debug -o 'exorcist ./demo/build.js.map > ./demo/build.js && echo ---------WATCHIFY--------`date +%r`'
